data.name: Longbowman
data.description:
Cheap long-ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.

+ Long range

+ Can construct Palings to fend off cavalry charges

- Slow movement speed

data.name: Man-at-Arms
data.description:
Tough infantry with good damage.

+ High armor

- Slow movement

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.

+ Uses a bow to attack

- Weak in combat

data.name: Wynguard Army
data.description: Produces an army including one each of Longbowman, Spearman, Man-at-Arms, Knight, and Trebuchet.

data.name: Battering Ram
data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.

+ High ranged armor

+ High health

- Can only attack buildings

- Slow movement speed

data.name: Bombard
data.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.

+ High damage

- Must be set up to fire

data.name: Crossbowman
data.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.

+ High damage

- High cost

- Slow movement speed

+ High movement speed

data.name: Knight
data.description:
Expensive cavalry with a powerful charge.

+ Heavy armor

+ Strong in melee combat

- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

data.name: Mangonel
data.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.

+ Effective against massed units

- Must be set up to fire

data.name: Monk
data.description:
Support unit with no combat capability. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.

+ Heals friendly units

- Slow movement speed

data.name: Ribauldequin
data.description:
Five-barreled gunpowder weapon effective against massed units. Deals little damage to buildings.

+ Can hit multiple targets in a single volley

- Short range

- Low ranged armor

data.name: Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.

+ Able to see into Stealth Forests

+ High movement speed

- Very weak in combat

data.name: Siege Tower
data.description:
Tall infantry transport with no combat capability. Allows garrisoned infantry to be unloaded directly onto Stone Walls.

+ High ranged armor

- Cannot attack

- Slow movement speed

data.name: Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.

+ Anti-cavalry specialist

- Susceptible to light ranged attacks

- Weak against armored infantry

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Effective at taking out high value targets at long range. Fires after quickly setting up.

+ Long range

+ Bonus damage vs siege engines

- Trivial damage vs. buildings

data.name: Trader
data.description: Traders generate Gold when assigned to trade with a Trade Post or another player’s Market. Once assigned to trade, the Trader makes repeated trips between its Home Market and the Trade Target. You can assign a new Home Market if you wish to.

data.name: Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.

+ Bonus damage vs buildings

- Must be set up to fire

- Inaccurate against units
